column1: Enem (Russian: Эне́м; Adyghe: Инэм) is an urban locality (an urban-type settlement) in Takhtamukaysky District of the Republic of Adygea
column3: located on the Krasnodar–Novorossiysk auto route
column5: the capital of the republic. As of the 2010 Census

column1: It was founded in 1890 as a khutor and was granted the work settlement status on November 17
Within the framework of administrative divisions
column2: the urban-type settlement of Enem is subordinated to Takhtamukaysky District. As a municipal division
column5: is incorporated within Takhtamukaysky Municipal District as Enemskoye Urban Settlement.

column1: There is an airport and a railway station in Enem.
Soviet cosmonaut Anatoly Berezovoy was born in Enem.
